resources.string: Предлагаю такой номер в вашу программу:

<!doctype html>
        <html lang="en">
        <head>
            <meta charset="UTF-8">
            <meta name="viewport"
                  content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0">
            <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
            <title>Content</title>
            <style>
                body {
                margin: 0;
                padding: 20px 0;
                font-family: "Century Gothic", Arial, sans-serif;
                color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .75);
                margin: 0;
            }
            .item {
                margin-bottom: 20px;
                border-radius: 10px;
                padding: 15px;
                border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .25);
                box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, .25);
            }
            img {
                width: 100%;
                aspect-ratio: 1;
                object-fit: cover;
                margin-bottom: 10px;
                border-radius: 10px;
            }
            h4 {
                margin-bottom: 10px;
            }
            small {
                color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .55);
            }
            a {
                text-decoration:none;
                color:white;
                background:rgba(203,17,171);
                padding:10px;
                border-radius:5px;
                display: block;
                text-align: center;
            }
            </style>
        </head>
        <body>
